Trade/Device Name(s): MIDI Sherlock Microbial Identification System BioDef™M
Specimen Type(s): Colonies from trypticase soy agar with 5% defibrinated sheep blood
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MIDI Sherlock Microbial Identification System BioDef™M
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MIDI Sherlock Microbial Identification System BioDef™M for identification of Bacillus anthracis using membrane fatty acid analysis via gas chromatography.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to aid in identification of Bacillus anthracis from cultured bacterial samples by analyzing membrane fatty acids using gas chromatography and pattern recognition software.
